Text.Language: Qen v~ran n~]t~riac: n~o~mooucioc: Viwt nem Ps/ri: nem Pip~neuma eyouab.
In the name of the Trinity, one in essence, the Father and the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

Comment.Language: On Adam days, the following parts are chanted as an introduction to the antiphonary of the day or the commentary of the occasion:

The following is chanted in a unique tune:
The saint of the day may be mentioned:

Text.Language: Ouon oumetcemnoc: n~h~r/i qen pikocmoc e~bolhiten pis~l/l: n~te ]a~gia Maria ]paryenoc: nem (...).
